thoughts.text: Now that we have modified the 'coin_data_downloader.py' script to use the 'pycoingecko' package to retrieve the necessary data, we can test the script to ensure that it works as expected. We can use the 'execute_python_file' command to execute the modified script and verify that it downloads the necessary data.
